title: Prioritized Enhancement Backlog
scope: Aggregation of all CRITICAL/MAJOR findings from QA-MS0 through QA-MS13

summary.already_fixed: 2 CRITICAL + 7 MAJOR = 9 findings fixed during audit
summary.minor_deferred: 125 MINOR findings tracked but not prioritized for immediate action

QA-MS1: S(x) critical data hard block (missing force/tool-life -> BLOCKED)
MQL flow rate unit fix (x60 -> x60000, L/min to mL/hr)
Dry titanium fire safety (DRY/AIR_BLAST + Ti/Superalloy -> false)
CoolantValidationEngine speed bracket dead else-if fix
QA-MS2: GSD_QUICK.md counts updated to QA-MS0 verified values
QA-MS3: SpeedFeed tool material normalization (Title Case fix for HSS/CBN)

critical_open.finding: WorkEnvelopeValidator: C-axis rotary limits not checked - rotary overtravel undetected
critical_open.impact: 5-axis machine could drive C-axis beyond limits, risking collision
critical_open.fix_effort: MEDIUM (add C-axis limit check to validatePosition())

critical_open.finding: WorkEnvelopeValidator: fixture_height_mm ignored in Z limit calculation - tool can drive through fixture
critical_open.impact: Z-axis collision risk when fixtures are present

critical_open.finding: PostProcessor: tap and bore move types silently dropped - no G84/G76 output
critical_open.impact: Tapping/boring cycles omitted from G-code without warning
critical_open.fix_effort: MEDIUM (add tap/bore case handlers with correct G-code)

critical_open.finding: PostProcessor: No 5-axis G-code output - no TCPM (G43.4), no CYCLE800, no M128/M129
critical_open.impact: 5-axis toolpaths cannot be post-processed despite full kinematics suite
critical_open.fix_effort: HIGH (implement 5-axis G-code generation for major controllers)

critical_open.finding: Bridge dispatcher: setDispatchHandler() never called - ALL route calls return _simulated:true

major_open.finding: RTCP is_within_tolerance hardcoded true - caller always gets green light
No safe retract (G28 Z0) before tool change in post-processor
promote_pattern and quarantine_pattern have NO tenant authorization check
Tenant config action allows global mutation without role/scope gate
calculateStrippingStrength() implemented but not exposed - thread stripping is safety-critical
PhysicsPredictionEngine SLD formula non-standard - mixes stiffness with radial immersion incorrectly
WireEDM skim speed formula INVERTED - produces speeds > first cut
J-C epsilon_dot_ref mismatch: DB stores 0.001 but code hardcodes 1.0
No Merchant's circle trigonometric decomposition - uses fixed ratios Ff/Fc=0.4, Fr/Fc=0.25
surface_finish action missing 'operation' parameter - loses process-specific Ra/Rz ratios
_physicsActions cross-field check is dead code - validateCrossFieldPhysics never called
calculateDrillingForce completely orphaned - no dispatcher exposure
ToolpathStrategyRegistry_Part1.ts (704 lines) completely orphaned - never imported
EXTENDED_STRATEGIES (~300+ entries) exported but unreachable from MCP
ToolpathGenerationEngine generate/simulate/optimize methods not exposed via actions
code_sandbox does NOT execute code - calls Claude to 'mentally simulate'
web_research does NOT search the web - uses model knowledge only
hook_trigger returns status:'executed' but does NOT actually execute hooks
Dual divergent chatter implementations (RegenerativeChatter vs PhysicsPrediction) - different formulations
DUAL HOOK SYSTEM - HookEngine and HookExecutor independent with incompatible phase naming
No semantic search in any knowledge engine - all use keyword/substring only
Chatter detection has NO FFT - variance proxy only
PredictiveMaintenanceEngine uses simulated data only - no real sensor integration
Domain hooks loaded from HOOK_REGISTRY.json with silent failure if file missing/corrupt
No TTL or cache invalidation in registries - stale data risk for daemon mode
ToolRegistry duplicate handling SKIP (silent) vs Material/Machine THROW - inconsistent
Hook provisioning NOT idempotent - each applyTemplate() creates NEW hooks without dedup
Audit score unweighted by severity - failing 1 mandatory = failing 1 optional
Access control conflict resolution incomplete - no UNION/INTERSECT for ITAR+HIPAA
94% of cadence functions untested (97/103) - fire on every dispatcher call
95% of engines have no unit-level tests (163/171) - tested only indirectly
Hook count discrepancy: QA-MS0 claimed 157, envelope 112, actual 220 - tracking outdated
103 cadence functions vs 40 claimed - 158% undercount
Only prism_calc has parameter alias normalization - thread/toolpath accept raw params

critical_fixed.finding: S(x) WARNING zone allowed bypass of hard block at 0.595-0.699
critical_fixed.impact: Unsafe machining parameters could pass safety gate

critical_fixed.finding: MQL flow rate unit bug: flowRate * 60 instead of * 60000 (L/min to mL/hr)

major_fixed.finding: S(x) partial credit 0.5 for missing data - should be 0.0
Dry titanium/superalloy with DRY/AIR_BLAST coolant not flagged as fire risk
Division by zero in flow utilization when availableFlow=0
All 4 GSD counts stale - updated during audit
SpeedFeed tool material normalization bug (HSS->Hss, CBN->Cbn)
shop_schedule routing conflict - dual routing to different engines

P0_immediate_safety.description: Safety-critical findings that could cause machine damage or produce dangerous G-code
P0_immediate_safety.risk_if_deferred: Machine collision, fixture damage, missing safety calculations

P1_functional_gaps.description: Core functionality that is broken, simulated, or produces incorrect results
P1_functional_gaps.risk_if_deferred: Incorrect calculations, orphaned features, broken integrations

P2_auth_compliance.risk_if_deferred: Unauthorized data access, compliance audit failures

P3_code_quality.description: Dead code, misleading names, documentation drift, consistency

P5_test_coverage.description: Testing gaps in cadence functions and engines

spot_checks.description: Verify no finding appears in both 'fixed' and 'open' lists
spot_checks.method: Cross-check IDs between critical_fixed/major_fixed and critical_open/major_open

spot_checks.description: Verify all open CRITICAL/MAJOR IDs appear in exactly one priority tier
spot_checks.method: Union of all tier ID lists vs set of open finding IDs
spot_checks.result: All 39 open findings assigned to exactly one tier
